name: Aeternum Break the Cycle
description:
Hey everyone, 

This is a game that, we, at Reflection of Detection, was working for some time. 

This is just a demo, not alpha, not beta, just demo and its MAIN PURPOSE is to show to you what kind of game we are building and what is general idea, by downloading it, you agree that there will be a lot of bugs and not that much of playable content, just a few of it, but as I said, we are publishing this demo, to get users feedback, about are they love this kind of game, gereral idea feedback - NOT about how it looks so far.

More description will be available soon.

View more: https://aeternum.webador.com/

Join official community: https://discord.gg/5g8u7grqnh
